授業目的: The microeconomics aims to describe the rational mechanism of the resources allocation in market or public administration. The basic concepts of proper choices of the economic units, such as consumer (Household), producer (Private Entity) and the state (Government), are presented in this course.
到達目標: Students will be able to understand the concepts of microeconomics; mechanism of optimization of economic transactions and the role of market. Concurrently, they are invited to acquire some technical knowledge on the statistics, the theory of games etc. to tackle the economical issues in the future global society.
授業方法:
Based on the lecture plan, the classe is conducted face-to-face in the classroom. For those who apply for the online classe, online simultaneous interactive follow-up is provided during the class hour.
For more information, please see the "Study Required outside Class section" below.
